press "s" to export

This drawing app is intended for artistic visualization of data.
- Drag your csv file into the canvas above.
- Test with different parameters on the left.
- Press s to save your work.
- Your csv file should be structured as such

annotation[str]

intended size of bubble[int or float]

number of arms[int]

Max

100

25
